i like either idea

rm2kmidi <kraftlos@...> wrote::-/ I don't really like the idea of going 100 years ahead in time, but
I'm up for as many posts as you want ^_^

On 5/17/05, Airly <airly2002@...> wrote:
> I ok this is a important note.
>  
> Looking that things are getting a little boring in NBW and In order to cheer
> this up, doing things more intersting and concentrate in doing good posts
> instead a big amount of posts, Azure and I were discusing some `points that
> will change this.
>  
> The point is as Azure said "the problem here is that the characters are
> alone. they don't have any society with which they can interact. what I
> suggest is this: either change the story by advancing 100 years in the
> future or change the place. what should be done is that there could be a few
> cities, but not only Maximal City and Predacon City. There would be neutral
> ones also where shadowy dealings could be made"
>  
> Also NPC's chars are including in this idea that will change this RPG.
>  
> Question is that I  need to know who will post at least once a week, 'cause
> this will help to delevelop to this idea. This and the new plot will affect
> all chars involved in this RPG and will let a major interacion among chars
> and result a major fun
>  
>  
> :)
>  
> What do you think?
>  
> ************
> *   Airly   *
> ***********
>
